rules_text:
Ward {2}
[i]Paradox[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card for each of that spell's colors. Put those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Until end of turn, spells you cast with the names of the revealed cards cost {0} to cast.
